# regionOfInterest

**Instance Property**

The area of the live video in view coordinates that the data scanner searches for items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var regionOfInterest: CGRect? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you add interface objects to the live video (using the [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/DataScannerViewController/overlayContainerView] property) that might hide items from a person, set this property to restrict the scanning area. The default value is the bounds of the view.

## Customizing the interface

- **overlayContainerView**: A view that the data scanner displays over its view without interfering with the Live Text interface.
